website_summaries.verdict: A small, simple heating pad with a chew-resistant cord.
pros: For cats and small dogs, this is a reasonably priced option that heats up well and is loved by pets
Measuring 19 by 19 by 7 inches, this bed can fit 1 or 2 small cats comfortably
The heating element regulates the temperature so your pet does not become overheated
cons: Cushioning is minimal, though most customers reported that their pets did not mind

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 14 year old cat loves this bed. As I read in reviews the bottom is not plush so I put it on a blanket. It's more like a heating pad feel. But considering our cat sleeps on a wooden bench radiator he isnt complaining. It heats up nice. I can feel it to touch but not to hot. Hes been using it non stop for a couple days now. I would reccomend this. Well made. No foam to get misshapen. Zips off for easy cleaning. Cord is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of padding
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a hard time getting Xander to sleep in this and it's cold over here! The base of the bed is not soft and finding padding to inside seems to block the heat. right now we have it sitting on a pillow but it is a little too unstable for my boy. I'm trying to find items help "tweak" it but so far no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H ✨

customer_reviews.title: No padding in bottom
customer_reviews.text: No padding in the bottom. Lots of padding around the edges. I was expecting at least a thin pad in the bottom, but it is only the thin heating pad and you feel all the stiffness of the heating pad and the hard floor. Not good for an old dog with joint issues. I'm trying it with a small blanket, but my dog likes to fluff-up her blanket, so then we're back to the no padding in areas she's laying on.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Warm and toasty.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My 17 year old small dog is no longer cold and shivering. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is I would have liked another color rather than white. Not a good dog color.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bednarczyk

customer_reviews.title: I got this for a always-cold doggie & she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a always-cold doggie & she loves it! I also have 2 cats that have been enjoying it too. Someone's always in it. They seem to feel warm & safe in this bed. My dog weights about 14 lbs & fits well in it with a bit of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Shaury Rice

customer_reviews.title: Inky's new bed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed for our Siamese cat and she refused to use it, but another of our cats moved right in. Inky loves it and seemed to want to sleep in it 24 hours a day. With the crazy weather we have been having he has not been in it for several days but we are sure he will return to his new bed at some point in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Yow

customer_reviews.title: My cat heartily approves
customer_reviews.text: My cat heartily approves. It's big. It's soft. It heats up nicely but not too hot. Best part, the cord is cat chewing proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Get Warm
customer_reviews.text: The heating pad only gets warm in one spot. The spot it gets warm is mostly covered by the side walls of the pad. The bottom has no padding whatsoever. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction, no padding on floor if bed.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect a comfy bed for you pup or cat. The bottom has zero padding and this makes all sides of the bed fall inward. Can feel the small round heating element through the fabric. The free floating heating element is about half the size it should be and does not cover the entire bottom of the bed. Very disappointed sent back the same day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Ianderson

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Although visually beautiful and looking so very cozy, I was disappointed to discover that the bottom of the bed where the cats are sleeping is not padded at all so it's like they are sleeping on the floor! They did not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L

customer_reviews.title: Comforting to older kitty with kidney pain
customer_reviews.text: We have a 19 year old male cat. His kidneys are often uncomfortable and feel better with heat. He absolutely loves this warm kitty bed. We put a towel in the bottom so it's not quite so warm, and we can change it out. We are so grateful we could find something to help him feel some better during his last years spent with us. He's the sweetest cat ever and deserves the best!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Seifried

customer_reviews.title: No padding in the actual bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed would be great if you're putting it on a soft surface but our old dog needs it on the floor and there is absolutely no padding on the bottom part with the heating pad. I was disappointed because it was more expensive and does seem sturdy, but just not soft on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A.

customer_reviews.title: You have to remember to unplug it to turn it ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to remember to unplug it to turn it off or on, but it works exactly as it was supposed to and my dog loves it now that the weather is cold again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I foster feral cats for a local TNVR group, and this is soooo nice to have when I get cats back from the vet for their spay/neuter. I also have a spoiled brat, I mean kitten who loves this when I am not using for our guests!
customer_reviews.author: J. Spotted Eagle Horse

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for our grand-kitty, Iggy (yep, I'm one of THOSE....lol!), and my daughter says she loves it! The cord is chew-proof, which was a selling point in this case. Iggy is really enjoying her bed!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Perry

customer_reviews.title: Prefect: happy cat
customer_reviews.text: After trying several different types of beds from other suppliers, I decided to try one last time....and hit the jackpot. My cat loves this bed. He is a senior cat and I'm sure the heat feels good on his bones. It's easy to clean and the cord for the heating pad is very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Bed comfortable. Not quite  warm enough so add heating pad on low to supplement .
customer_reviews.text: Bought new dog bed when older bed was ‘chewed’ up. Thought heater in dog bed would be a plus. Our Chihuahua sleeps in bed comfortably. Most of time we add a heating pad on low because dog bed heat isn’t warm enough AND add a small blanket on top for dog to bury herself in. Whenever leave house, come home and find dog sleeping in her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it; doesn't get too hot.
customer_reviews.text: Cats like it; doesn't get too hot. The cord is protected by a plastic shroud which is great if your pet is a chewer. It gets just a little warm, kind of like the low setting on a heated blanket, so you won't have to worry about it getting too hot for your furry one.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it!
customer_reviews.text: Never gets too hot. Works great in staying warm and doesn't turn off (like other heating beds) overnight. Outer bed is 100% machine washable. My kittens love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vmp

customer_reviews.title: My cat absolutely loves this bed! She took to ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this bed! She took to it right away and the cord is wrapped so it made me feel more safe that way. I still do not leave it plugged in if I am not home (personal preference) but my cat lives in there when it is on!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: NOT SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: These beds are warm and cozy, but BEWARE. THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO PADDING IN THE BOTTOM! My cats and dog like SOFT and warm and these beds don't deliver. The bottom is warm and the sides are cuddly, but there's just a piece of cloth on the bottom and you can feel the heating unit.
customer_reviews.author: KathyEMurray

customer_reviews.title: NO STUFFING
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely no padding on the base of this bed. The only thing between the cat and that heating pad is a thin layer of material. I added furniture stuffing to make a cushion so the cat is not laying directly on the heating pad! Heating pad and cord are a nice quality. The overall size 19 x 19 x 7 is excellent for my 20 pound 36 inch long cat, (tip to tip). Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My three long hair chihuahuas love it it’s soft durable easy to clean only thing bottom isn’t padded otherwise good product
customer_reviews.author: T AND J MISCELLANIES

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it at all, no padding on the floor, the other heated bed I have is completely round with supportive padded sides and a pillow bottom. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Survivor girl

customer_reviews.title: No pad inside
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it’s not too great and I bought 2. Too small for a Yorkie and missing pad. Kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats are outside cats but they can be in the garage. Got this for the garage so they have a warm spot in the winter months. They loved it from day one. Bottom could use a little more padding but other than that, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mjackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our lil Min Pin.
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 year old Min Pin loves this bed! She has joint problems and she gets in this, laughs on her side and falls right asleep. It's not hot but it's a great temperature for a dog that lays on it for an extended period of time. Just what we wanted. Meets our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Curt S.

customer_reviews.title: The heating pad itself is too small and hard
customer_reviews.text: The cats find themselves huddled in one end of the bed, or to wherever the heating pad has shifted. I also had to add a folded fleece on top of the bottom of the bed as it is not thick enough to cushion the hardness of the heating pad. The pad is not as large as the bed's base...will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3... Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing. Both of my cats and my moms cat LOVE this. I’ve bought 3. I wish the bottom was more padded but they never mind. 100% recommend and it’s so warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for older senior small animals
customer_reviews.text: My cat is almost 18 yrs old. She struggles with staying warm. This is amazing for her. She doesn't leave it often.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Warm bed for poochie
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much like everything about this bed except the cord. It's not an attractive sight. Too bulky. I have the bed in my foyer where my dog likes to stay most of the time so I can't hide the cord very well. Doesn't change the fact that my dog loves the soft warmth coziness it provides. That's more important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my kitty warm
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Not too hot. My kitty loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Wulf

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it! It seems that they don’t care about the bottom (no soft puffy pad). I think the temperature is perfect for pets since they are more sensitive than humans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It was flimsier on the inside bottom than I expected. I sewed a soft bottom for it.
customer_reviews.author: Booklady

customer_reviews.title: Heated Dog bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed is lovely but does not get as warm as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: EHHH
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get that warm, the bottoms is not padded either. It is good for the price, but I’m not all that impressed. The cord is covered in a plastic case probably to discourage animals from chewing, although I think a dog might want to chew on that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: My friend tells me now how much it sucks because it has no pad, I will have to improvise, but I shouldn’t have to.
customer_reviews.author: w.xard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved this bed from the moment I brought it in the house. The bottom is thin due to the heating pad, so I bought a $7.00 soft pad at Petco to put under it. The heating pad is the perfect temperature-not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: DEG7

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The cording came in pinched and looks strained. There is no on or off switch or timer. I am disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and used a LOT!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to leave on for longer periods. Doesn’t get hot like a heated blanket. Just enough for the kitties to LOVE immediately.
customer_reviews.author: raechel frick

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for a rescue organization. The woman that runs it has a few others and just loves it..and the dogs love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Whitelakelady

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would never had bought this for my dog. The bottom is so flat and has no cushion and after a couple months the heating element stopped working. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Mica

customer_reviews.title: Nice high sides
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves her bed! Bottom is not cushiony, but that doesn’t seem to bother her.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: The product doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Have to return it.Heating element does not work.Plug it in to 3 different outlets that I know worked and the bed never heated up.Extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Callan

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for older lonely cats
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this in and not even an hour later my car had found it and was curled up. I’ve kept it plugged in around the clock with no issue. The bottom isn’t very cushioned but the cat doesn’t seem to mind. The gentle heat is perfect for her
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Good bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very nice, I wish it was a bit smaller because this dog is pretty old and little. But she likes it and seems comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Beth Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Don't buy this bed!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. I've had this bed for six weeks, and it did get mildly warm at first. However, I just moved it and learned that it’s not even mildly warm anymore...and of course, I'm two weeks out of the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it and that makes it a five star item!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere if you are looking for soft comfort
customer_reviews.text: Not very cushiony for a dog with arthritis. I guess all the money went into the heating pad they put in it. Hope it holds up seems cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hill

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok bed. The sides are cushioned but the bottom, where the heating pad is, does not have cushion. My dogs won’t use the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing our cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love this item it was the only thing that our cat took a liking to right away
customer_reviews.author: Cody Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was recieved with the middle bed padding missing and a large ripped hole where the electrical cord is. I would not recommend this buyer's products to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: nick bradley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cats love the bed. They are barn cats and enjoy their cozy warm bed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Best heated cat bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved them so much I had send for a second one..
customer_reviews.author: anita marsh

customer_reviews.title: Bed didn’t heat up at all
customer_reviews.text: The bed barely heated up. Couldn’t even tell it was a heated bed. Very dissatisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Genny Meador

customer_reviews.title: not what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: the heating p4ad is not hot enough and the padding is really not even any in there
customer_reviews.author: Maurice A Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was so Purrfect, Comfy & Warm for Sick Rescue Kittie.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gunnarson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED. Bottom is only VERY VERY thin material, no soft bed for my babies! I should have sent it back, too late now! I will buy something else and this will go in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Peddicord

customer_reviews.title: Cat Not Impressed....
customer_reviews.text: Bottom pad is way too thin, my cat did not like this product...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wall

product_meta.title: ALEKO PHBED17S Electric Thermo-Pad Heated Pet Bed for Dogs and Cats 19 x 19 x 7 Inches Gray and White
product_meta.description: Spoil your beloved pet with this heated plush crate pet bed. So comfortable, you will be tempted to curl up yourself. Your dog or cat will love having a comfortable, personal spot to lie down, and the electric heating element will keep them warm and cozy no matter what temperature it is outside. The bed is powered by a 6 foot long cord with heavy duty chew resistant protection, to product against playful pets who love to chew everything in sight. An internal thermostat automatically regulates the pad’s temperature, so that your pet won’t get too overheated by mistake. The pillow is surrounded by over-stuffed outer edge padding, making your pet feel safe and secure, and the water resistant, non slip poly canvas base is perfect for any surface. Create a warm peaceful place for your dog or cat to cuddle up and give them the relaxation and comfort they deserve. Product dimensions: 19 x 19 x 7 inches; Color: Gray and White.
feature_bullets: Ultra soft bed with an electric heating element will keep your pet warm and cozy in any weather
6 foot long cord is coated with heavy-duty chew-resistant protection
Internal thermostat automatically regulates the pad’s temperature
Overstuffed outer edges for comfort and security; water resistant, non slip poly canvas base
Product dimensions: 19 x 19 x 7 inches; Color: Gray and White

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
